plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that they enjoy historical dramas, war movies, science fiction, and religious themes. The mood of the musical score can range from intense and heroic to melancholic and reflective. The setting can be anywhere from the Scottish Highlands to the trenches of World War I to the modern-day United States.
